key.frycparry.key_parry: Parry (set it to Unbound to parry with Use Key)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.title: Sword Parry Config
Enable blocking with other items [Restart Required]
For items that are not swords, shovels, axes (etc), but have attack speed attribute
Disable block action after parrying axe attack
When turned on, axe attack will set cooldown whether it was parry or not
Make enchantments for shield appear on swords and axes found in chests
This option doesn't do anything when blocking with axes and swords is disabled
Dual wielding settings [Restart Required]
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.multipl: Reduce knockback strength for players by:
Example: when set to 3, and knockback strength of active item is 9, knockback strength for parried player will be 6 (9 - 3 = 6)
Reduce weakness duration for players by:
Example: when set to 30, and weakness duration of active item is 100, weakness duration for parried player will be 70 (100 - 30 = 70)
Reduce weakness amplifier for players by:
Example: when set to 1, and weakness amplifier of active item is 2, weakness amplifier for parried player will be 1 (2 - 1 = 1)
Reduce slowness duration for players by:
Example: when set to -30, and slowness duration of active item is 100, slowness duration for parried player will be 130 (100 - (-30) = 130)
Reduce slowness amplifier for players by:
Example: when set to -1, and slowness amplifier of active item is 1, slowness amplifier for parried player will be 2 (1 - (-1) = 2)
Cooldown after switching item, blocking attack or interrupting block action [/reload Required]
